title: Hitman Online
plot: When nation's homicide rate reaches record high and people get killed on every street corner, it is no more secret that Internet has been abused to become an ultimate tool of crime. Bizarre website "Hitman Online" has finally made assassination affordable and hassle free for regular folks. Anybody can become a Hitman and anybody can hire one with just a click of a mouse. The dilemma is that "Hitman Online" is not just another website on the World Wide Network. It is a technological achievement in the direction of anonymous and surveillance-free cyberspace. Nobody can know who created it, who is using it and how to eliminate it. What is the social impact of such website? Why was it created? What is the destiny of the creator?
tagline: Where death is just a mouse click away...
